Question: This person then elected to have breast implant surgery.
Hints: On 14 August 2005, Comedy Central created the Roast of this person to honor the sex symbol for the past decade.
On 10 November 2006, it was announced that this person had miscarried while in Vancouver shooting a new film, Blonde and Blonder.
In February 2006, this person decided to boycott the Kentucky Derby because of its support for Kentucky Fried Chicken.
